value.name: Fayetteville man suing city after he says excessive force used during 2019 arrest caused concussion, other injuries
value.description: A Fayetteville man says excessive force was used during his arrest in 2019, causing him to have a concussion and other injuries. Robert Edwards is suing the city

value.name: DNA-matching to catch killers might always work on TV but we should not have blind faith in it
value.description: Catching crooks and killers became a lot easier when DNA-matching hit the courts. It was the greatest investigation breakthrough since law enforcement took up fingerprinting in the 1890s.
